note:
Ph.D. & J.D. I studied the chemical ecology of spotted lanternflies and the thermal physiology of birds. Interested in environmental policy and regulations that contribute to biodiversity conservation and climate change mitigation.

She/her, bird nerd. I talk about birbs, insects, environmental science, crafts, video games, and 1980s anime.

// 환경과학 박사 학위가 있는 새내기 공익법무 종사자. 동물행동학 및 동물생리학, 환경 정책, 생물다양성 보전에 관심이 있어요. 다른 관심사는 탐조, 수공예, 1980년대 일본 애니.
